articles.title: Second New Glenn launch slips toward fall as program leadership departs - Ars Technica
articles.description: We need to produce a lot of second stages.

articles.author: Lauren Forristal, Sarah Perez
articles.title: WWDC 2025: Everything announced, including Liquid Glass, Apple Intelligence updates, and more - TechCrunch
articles.description: At WWDC 2025, Apple will likely focus on the next iOS, which is rumored to have the most significant design change since the introduction of iOS 7.
articles.content:
WWDC 2025 kicked off Monday and as in previous years, the company focused on software updates and new technologies, including the next version of iOS, called iOS 26.
This year, there was considerabl… [+3945 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: Full-screen Xbox handheld UI is coming to all Windows PCs “starting next year” - Ars Technica
articles.description: Microsoft has been experimenting with “handheld mode” for Windows 11 since 2022.
